DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate radiation exposure and procedure times for continuous fluoroscopic monitoring during lumbar ESI
DOC.brief_title: Radiation Exposure in Spine Intervention Under Angiography
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this prospective study was to evaluate radiation exposure and procedure times for fluoroscopic monitoring during lumbar ESI with analyzing the differences among operators (experienced staff and trainee) and among different method for ESI.
DOC.criteria: Suspected of having radiculopathic low back pain Angiography is contraindicated
